properties.name: kyc.providers.onfido.api-key

properties.description: Timeout for Onfido API calls in seconds

properties.description: Maximum file size for KYC documents in bytes

properties.description: List of allowed file types for KYC documents

properties.description: Maximum verification attempts allowed per user

properties.description: KYC session timeout in minutes

properties.description: Document expiry period in days

properties.description: Verification expiry period in days

properties.description: Enable automatic approval of KYC verifications

properties.description: Number of documents required for ADVANCED KYC level
